thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I have ordered from this site every week for years. They have a great selection and I rarely am unable to find what I'm looking for, but it would be nice if they had some kind of benefits for long term customers. I place weekly orders of $75-$100 for years now and there has been no benefit of staying loyal. If there was a site that had a comparable selection with some benefits to it customers it wouldn't take much for me to switch.
